APR 22 Virtual Program: Intro to American Sign Language Wednesday, April 22, 2020 - 4:00 p.m. to 4:30 p.m. 18 Carnegie Lane, Grimsby, Ontario, L3M 1Y1 In this virtual program, mother and daughter Aleksandra and Gordana will do a short introduction to American Sign Language (ASL). Aleks is Deaf, and will teach the Alphabet in ASL followed by a few phrases that participants will learn to communicate in ASL. Her mother Gordana is hearing and will share her experiences as a h ... APR 22 CANCELLED - Parks, Recreation & Culture Committee Meeting Wednesday, April 22, 2020 - 5:30 p.m. APR 22 Virtual Program: Del Lord - From Grimsby to Hollywood Wednesday, April 22, 2020 - 7:00 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. 18 Carnegie Lane, Grimsby, Ontario, L3M 1Y1 Join local historian Shawn A. Roy for a virtual presentation about Grimsby-born Three Stooges director, Del Lord. During his decades long career spanning silent movies to sound, Del worked with Buster Keaton, Bing Crosby, and even another famous Grimsby connection! Shawn’s talk will guide the audience through Del’s life, ... Just follow the colorful pictures in our manual and build exciting projects such as AM radios, burglar alarms, doorbells and much more! independent. JUL 1 Virtual Canada Day Celebrations Wednesday, July 1, 2020 - 11:00 a.m. Virtual Canada Celebrations Celebrate Canada with us on July 1st! There are numerous ways to celebrate at home, online, or wherever you are to share in what in means to be Canadian! Prepare to Celebrate by: Downloading the Town of Grimsby's Canada Day Toolkit and completing some of the creative crafts at home. Register ... All ages welcome. AUG 9 Heartfulness Meditation on Zoom Monday, August 9, 2021 - 7:00 p.m. to 7:45 p.m. Heartfulness Meditation helps to reduce stress, and stay balanced in body, mind and soul. Join us once a month for these virtual sessions that will include a practical experience of meditation and a discussion about stillness, mindfulness, and heartfulness. Register in advance here: https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/reg ... AUG 10 Normal vs Not Normal Aging Tuesday, August 10, 2021 - 1:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. Join us on August 10, 2021 between 1:00pm to 3:00pm for an engaging workshop which will explore "normal" and "not normal" aging.
